EVENT_Garage_Closed.Resolution: Someone has arrived or left via the garage
EVENT_Garage_Closed.Explanation: If the door open/closed w/in 2 minutes, someone probably came or went

EVENT_No_Presence.Resolution: Someone has left via the garage

EVENT_Presence.Resolution: Someone has come via the garage

EVENT_Porch_After.Resolution: Some has left via the front door
EVENT_Porch_After.Explanation: Our confidence goes up because porch triggered after

EVENT_And_Mvmnt_Before.Resolution: Some has left via the front door
EVENT_And_Mvmnt_Before.Explanation: Our confidence goes up because now we see that there was movement before

EVENT_Porch_Before.Resolution: Some has come in via the front door
EVENT_Porch_Before.Explanation: Our confidence goes up because porch triggered before

EVENT_And_Mvmnt_After.Resolution: Some has come in via the front door
EVENT_And_Mvmnt_After.Explanation: Our confidence goes up because now we see that there was movement after
